cause.description:
The nonprofit organization the funds will go to is World Vision(http://www.worldvision.org). They work all over the globe, so they really fit into my wants. Here are some ways they've helped:
People whose lives are endangered by disasters or conflict need immediate, skilled assistance. World Vision is committed to respond to any major emergency around the world, through our own programs or in co-operation with partner agencies. For example, World Vision has responded to famine in Ethiopia and North Korea, hurricanes in Central America, earthquakes in El Salvador and India Taiwan and Turkey, and war refugees in Kosovo, Chechnya, Sierra Leone, Angola, and East Timor.
Please join and help the cause! We are so fortunate, lets give to those who aren't!
YOU CAN CHECK THE ANNOUNCEMENTS AREA FOR RECENT EMERGENCIES YOUR MONEY WILL BE DONATED TO!
**Please note: If you donate, your gift is tax deductable. You will get an email verification to keep for your records.**
PLEASE INVITE EVERYONE YOU KNOW!!
I decided to name this cause The Click to Save Project because it really is all about helping, educating, and passing on information online. Through a click of the mouse, you are helping those in need. How wonderfully easy!
1. To help those who are less fortunate
2. To shed hope on those who need it
3. To make a difference in the world
